name: Import existing VM with 3 disks - VMware vSphere
description: This template can be used to import an existing virtual machine with 3 disks into IBM Cloud Automation Manager.

metadata.longDescription: This template can be used to import an existing virtual machine with 3 disks into IBM Cloud Automation Manager.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: This template cannot be used for deploying new virtual machines.
